Article Title: Rs 39 crore! India women‚Äôs cricket team set to pocket record prize money after World Cup win
Article Text:
India women secured a historic win at DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai to secure a record sum in prize money from the ICC (AP Photo/Rafiq Maqbool)

Harmanpreet Kaur gets emotional after leading India to World Cup glory

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Team India are set to pocket a record-breaking sum from the International Cricket Council (ICC) following their historic victory in the Women‚Äôs World Cup 2025 final against South Africa at the DY Patil Stadium on Sunday.With the win, India not only lifted their maiden Women‚Äôs World Cup title but also secured the highest-ever prize money in the history of cricket - a whopping USD 4.48 million (Rs 39.78 crore).The amount is part of a total tournament pool of USD 13.88 million (about Rs 123 crore), which was announced by the ICC ahead of the event. This was a whopping 297 per cent increase from the USD 3.5 million purse at the 2022 edition in New Zealand.The winners‚Äô prize of USD 4.48 million represents a 239 per cent jump from the USD 1.32 million that Australia received for winning the last edition, while runners-up South Africa will earn USD 2.24 million (Rs 19.88 crore).Each losing semi-finalist is entitled to USD 1.12 million (Rs 9.94 crore), while all eight teams were guaranteed USD 250,000 for participation, plus an additional USD 34,314 for every group-stage win.According to a PTI report, the BCCI is also considering matching the prize and bonuses that the men‚Äôs team received after their T20 World Cup 2024 win.A senior BCCI source told PTI, ‚ÄúThe BCCI supports equal pay for men and women and hence there are lot of discussions that if our girls win the World Cup, the reward won't be anything less compared to the men's global triumph. But it isn't nice to make an announcement before they win the Cup.‚ÄùThe Rohit Sharma-led men‚Äôs team was awarded ‚Çπ125 crore for their T20 World Cup victory last year, a figure that could now serve as a benchmark for the women‚Äôs side following their landmark success.As the celebrations continue in Navi Mumbai, India‚Äôs triumph, and the record prize it brings marks a defining moment for women‚Äôs cricket and reflects the ICC‚Äôs stated goal of ‚Äúa world-class Women‚Äôs Cricket World Cup‚Äù and ‚Äúa clear commitment to long-term growth.‚ÄùThe final saw Team India women defeat Laura Wolvaardt's South Africa by 52 runs in Navi Mumbai.
Article Summary: India women secured a historic win at dy patil stadium in navi mumbai to secure a record sum in prize money from the icc. India not only lifted their maiden women‚Äôs world cup title but also secured the highest-ever prize money in the history of cricket.

Article Title: List of Women‚Äôs World Cup winners: Full list of champions over the years
Article Text:
The ICC Women's World Cup final saw Shafali Verma take two wickets after being handed the ball in a surprise move by skipper Harmanpreet Kaur (AP Photo/Rafiq Maqboola)

How Jay Shah pushed for women's cricket, BCCI secretary Saikia explains

List of Women‚Äôs ODI World Cup winners from 1973 to 2025



Year Winner Runner-up Host 1973 England Australia England 1978 Australia England India 1982 Australia England New Zealand 1988 Australia England Australia 1993 England New Zealand England 1997 Australia New Zealand India 2000 New Zealand Australia New Zealand 2005 Australia India South Africa 2009 England New Zealand Australia 2013 Australia West Indies India 2017 England India England 2022 Australia England New Zealand 2025 India South Africa India/Sri Lanka

The Women‚Äôs ODI World Cup 2025 has reached its grand finale at the Dr DY Patil Stadium, where India and South Africa battled it out for cricket‚Äôs biggest prize. For the first time in history, South Africa featured in a Women‚Äôs World Cup final, while India eyed their maiden title after finishing runners-up in 2005 and 2017.The current edition, jointly hosted by India and Sri Lanka, has been marked by record crowds and high-quality cricket. From Shafali Verma‚Äôs fearless batting in the final to Laura Wolvaardt‚Äôs world record, the tournament has showcased the depth of women‚Äôs cricket.Earlier in the semifinals, India produced one of the most memorable chases in World Cup history, overhauling Australia‚Äôs 338-run total with five wickets to spare in Navi Mumbai. Jemimah Rodrigues‚Äô unbeaten 127 and captain Harmanpreet Kaur‚Äôs composed 89 powered India into their third final.In the 2025 edition, India Women clinched a sensational win, becoming first-time winners by a 52-run margin to lift their maiden crown.The Women‚Äôs World Cup was first played in 1973, and remains the oldest global tournament in women‚Äôs sport. Over five decades, it has grown into a global event with packed stadiums.Australia continue to dominate the winner‚Äôs list with seven titles, while England have claimed four. New Zealand, the 2000 champions, remain the only other side to have lifted the trophy.
Article Summary: The women's odi world cup 2025 has reached its grand finale at the dr dy patil stadium. India and south africa battled it out for cricket's biggest prize. For the first time in history, south africa featured in a women‚Äôs world cup final. India eyed their maiden title after finishing runners-up in 2005 and 2017.

Article Title: Gayle didn‚Äôt flee: Rasool slams memes mocking star after Kashmir cricket fiasco
Article Text:
Photo/Agencies

SRINAGAR: Former India all-rounder Parvez Rasool condemned Tuesday social media memes mocking West Indies star Chris Gayle after the abrupt collapse of Indian Heaven Premier League (IHPL) in J&K, calling the portrayal ‚Äúirresponsible and harmful for Kashmir‚Äôs cricket‚Äù.Rasool said Gayle did not flee but left after completing his three-match commitment. ‚ÄúWhen he left the hotel, everyone greeted him warmly. People must show respect to such a great cricketer,‚Äù he said, adding that Gayle‚Äôs presence encouraged local players and promoted tourism. Gayle was seen last week enjoying a Shikara ride on Dal Lake, smiling and waving to fans.‚ÄúAn international cricketer of great repute, Chris Gayle, was here. He praised one of our boys and said he played well. It was a rare moment for us,‚Äù Rasool said. ‚ÄúHe interacted with local players, visited Dal Lake to promote tourism, and now people are making memes saying he ran away. That‚Äôs unfair and not good for us or for cricket.‚ÄùThe T20 tournament organised by non-profit Yuva Society collapsed Saturday night after organisers allegedly fled a Srinagar hotel without paying players, staff, or umpires.Turning to the controversy, Rasool said the league was ‚Äúpoorly managed‚Äù but not a scam. ‚ÄúI was the biggest sufferer and they didn‚Äôt pay me anything,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThe idea was to give local players a chance to share the field with international cricketers. Unfortunately, lack of sponsors and poor crowd turnout ruined it.‚Äù
Article Summary: Former india all-rounder parvez rasool condemned tuesday social media memes mocking west indies star chris gayle. Rasool said gayle did not flee but left after completing his three-match commitment. The t20 tournament organised by non-profit yuva society collapsed saturday night.

Article Title: "No fairytale ending": George Springer's wife Charlise breaks silence after Toronto Blue Jays' devastating World Series loss
Article Text:
George Springer with his wife Charlise (Image via: Charlise Springer's IG)

Charlise Springer‚Äôs words remind fans what baseball truly stands for

A season that tested every ounce of heart, faith, and resilience

Looking ahead as the Blue Jays promise to ‚Äòrun it back‚Äô

When the Toronto Blue Jays‚Äô dream run came to a heartbreaking end in Game 7 of the World Series, it wasn‚Äôt just the players who felt the pain‚Äîit was their families, the fans, and an entire nation that had believed in their story. After leading the series 3‚Äì2 and returning home to Rogers Centre with hopes of ending a 32-year title drought, the Blue Jays watched their fairytale slip away. Costly missed chances in Game 6 and a gut-wrenching ninth-inning home run by Miguel Rojas sealed their fate, leaving the stadium heavy with silence and disbelief.A day later, while the city was still nursing its heartbreak, George Springer‚Äôs wife, Charlise Springer, stepped forward with a message that struck deep emotional chords. Her heartfelt words, filled with gratitude, pride, and grace, reminded everyone that baseball is more than just wins and losses‚Äîit‚Äôs about resilience, connection, and moments that outlast the scoreboard. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so proud of my husband, this team and every single family that poured their hearts into this season,‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúThe highs, the late nights, the travel, the memories. Baseball doesn‚Äôt promise fairytale endings, but it gives you people and moments that last a lifetime.Feeling nothing but gratitude for the chance to represent Canada‚Äôs team and be part of something so specialüá®üá¶ üíô Until next seasonüêé#RunItBack.‚ÄùCharlise‚Äôs post quickly spread across social media, not for its glamour, but for its sincerity. Thousands of fans flooded the comments, calling her words ‚Äúbeautiful,‚Äù ‚Äúreal,‚Äù and ‚Äúexactly what the city needed to hear.‚Äù In a moment of collective heartbreak, her message brought perspective‚Äîit wasn‚Äôt about the loss, but about the love, loyalty, and shared memories that baseball creates. Her reflection reminded everyone that behind every player‚Äôs jersey is a family that lives every win and loss just as deeply.For the Blue Jays, this wasn‚Äôt just another playoff push‚Äîit was a season that redefined their identity. From battling injuries and midseason slumps to clawing their way into the postseason spotlight, Toronto defied every odd stacked against them. Charlise‚Äôs words, ‚ÄúThis group showed nothing but heart, humility and resilience from day one and it was an honor to watch them chase this dream together ,‚Äù perfectly echoed what fans had witnessed all season long‚Äîa team that played for each other and carried the weight of a nation on their shoulders.George Springer, one of the veterans who has become the emotional heartbeat of the clubhouse, embodied that spirit of fight. Through every late-night comeback and pressure-packed inning, he stood as a symbol of belief and leadership. And while the final chapter didn‚Äôt end in celebration, it unfolded with the kind of grit that defines lasting legacies.Though the pain of this loss may linger through the winter, the message of hope remains loud and clear. With their core still intact and a fanbase unwavering in belief, the Blue Jays are already turning the page with one mantra: Run it back. As Charlise Springer so beautifully expressed, baseball may not always deliver fairytales‚Äîbut it always delivers moments that stay forever. And for Toronto, that story is far from over. Because every heartbreak in this city, only fuels a stronger comeback. And when the lights shine again next season, the Blue Jays will be ready to write the ending they've long waited for.Also read: Shohei Ohtani‚Äôs rare Game 7 moment sparks fiery exchange as Toronto Blue Jays‚Äô manager John Schneider confronts umpire in World Series showdown
Article Summary: Charlise springer‚Äôs words remind fans what baseball truly stands for. The toronto blue jays‚Äô dream run came to a heartbreaking end in game 7 of the world series. Her heartfelt words reminded everyone that baseball is about resilience, connection, and moments that outlast the scoreboard.

Article Title: ‚ÄúAbsolutely disgusting‚Äù: Brittany Mahomes‚Äô harsh reaction to a disturbing Bills fan stunt is trending again ahead of Chiefs vs. Bills game
Article Text:
Ahead of the Chiefs-Bills game, a past incident involving Brittany Mahomes and a fan display in Buffalo has resurfaced. She publicly condemned a disrespectful Kermit the Frog puppet mocking Patrick Mahomes, urging for basic decency. This reminder of respect underscores the intense rivalry, proving that even amidst fierce competition, human dignity remains paramount.

Brittany Mahomes felt the line was crossed and she wanted the public to know it

As Patrick Mahomes returns to Buffalo, the stakes are different ‚Äî but emotions are always present





For most NFL spouses, game week tends to mean travel, schedules, childcare adjustments, and a flood of national attention, but for Brittany Mahomes, there‚Äôs history attached to Buffalo. And not the fun, competitive kind. Before this weekend‚Äôs Chiefs-Bills showdown, an old incident involving a Bills supporter is circulating again online, reminding fans that not every rivalry moment lives only inside the stadium walls.Brittany, who has been in the public eye alongside Patrick Mahomes since college, once publicly reacted to a fan display that crossed a major line. Now, with yet another high-stakes meeting on the schedule, the memory of that moment is once again part of the conversation.Ahead of a previous Chiefs vs Bills matchup, Brittany Mahomes addressed what she considered to be one of the ugliest fan moments she had ever seen involving her family. A Kermit the Frog puppet, wearing a Patrick Mahomes No. 15 jersey, was hung publicly in Buffalo.Brittany's reaction was immediate, emotional, and blunt. ‚ÄúDo we remember this, Buffalo? Absolutely disgusting,‚Äù she posted. She also followed that with a pointed reminder about basic decency in sports culture, writing, ‚ÄúSo as you go home tonight, I pray we become better people.‚ÄùThose words weren‚Äôt just about trash talk. They were about human respect and they still land heavily today.Sunday's meeting wasn't just another regular season date. Patrick Mahomes and Josh Allen have developed the kind of on-field rivalry that dictates national windows, defines postseason eras, and fuels nonstop football debate. Kansas City enters with momentum. Buffalo enters with swagger. Both enter with pressure.And on the periphery of all that football energy sits a memory from November 2024, a moment Brittany Mahomes hasn‚Äôt forgotten, and clearly never wanted normalized. It proves one thing: rivalries can be electric. But respect still matters, especially when the entire world is watching.Also Read: ‚ÄúA sad, pathetic, nobody loser‚Äù: Swifties unleash fury on Kayla Nicole after Halloween stunt reignites drama with Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes publicly condemned a disrespectful kermit the frog puppet mocking patrick mahomes. She felt the line was crossed and she wanted the public to know it. This reminder of respect underscores the intense rivalry, proving that even amidst fierce competition, human dignity remains paramount.

Article Title: MLB trade rumors: Detroit Tigers‚Äô predicted to land $33.6 million Toronto Blue Jays star as Gleyber Torres filler
Article Text:
Detroit Tigers greet Javier Baez, right, after hitting a walk-off single (Image via AP Photo)

Detroit Tigers

Offseason Outlook: Big Names and Bigger Moves

Gleyber Torres‚Äô Status and the Detroit Tigers‚Äô Dilemma

Toronto Blue Jays Shortstop Bo Bichette (Image via Getty)

Potential Replacement: Bo Bichette Trade Idea

The Bigger Picture: Sending a Message to Tarik Skubal

As the 2025 MLB season officially comes to an end, the focus quickly shifts toward the offseason - a period that promises major shakeups across the league. With a long list of stars expected to test free agency, front offices are already weighing their options between blockbuster signings and strategic trades. For the, one of the biggest storylines centers on their uncertain infield situation and the possible departure of Gleyber Torres.This offseason features a loaded market with names like Kyle Schwarber, Cody Bellinger, Alex Bregman, and Pete Alonso potentially switching uniforms. While many clubs are expected to make aggressive pushes in free agency, others will look to bolster their rosters through the trade market. The Tigers may fall into the latter group, especially if they decide to replace Torres with an established All-Star talent.This winter‚Äôs free-agent market is stacked with talent. Stars like Kyle Schwarber, Cody Bellinger, Alex Bregman, and Pete Alonso headline a group of players who could redefine the league landscape. However, while many franchises will dive into free agency, others - like the Detroit Tigers - may prefer the trade route to strengthen key areas.Expect some clubs to move aggressively early in the market, while others play the waiting game to gauge player values. Either way, there‚Äôs a sense that this offseason will spark considerable movement, with several marquee names possibly finding new homes.The Detroit Tigers face a crucial decision regarding Gleyber Torres, who is now an unrestricted free agent. Losing him would be a significant blow to the team‚Äôs lineup. Torres played in 145 regular-season games in 2025, producing a .256/.358/.387 slash line with 16 home runs and 74 RBIs. His consistency and presence were vital to Detroit‚Äôs overall success, making him a priority - though re-signing him may prove difficult given market competition.According to Bleacher Report‚Äôs Joel Reuter, the Tigers could make a blockbuster move by trading with the Toronto Blue Jays for two-time All-Star Bo Bichette. Reuter wrote, ‚ÄúBo Bichette does not turn 28 years old until March 5, and after a down year in 2024, he returned to elite form offensively this season with a .311/.357/.483 line that included 44 doubles, 18 home runs and 94 RBI in 139 games.‚ÄùHere‚Äôs a quick look at how Bichette compares to Torres in 2025:Bichette‚Äôs offensive resurgence makes him an ideal candidate for Detroit‚Äôs infield. Although his defensive metrics at shortstop suggest limitations, a shift to second base could maximize his strengths while filling Torres‚Äô vacancy.A move for Bichette would carry broader implications beyond filling a positional gap. It would also signal Detroit‚Äôs commitment to building a legitimate championship contender. As Reuter noted, ‚ÄúIt would also represent a significant move to show Tarik Skubal the front office is serious about building a title contender, as the Detroit Tigers try to hammer out a long-term extension with their ace before he hits the open market after the 2026 season. ‚ÄùBy bringing in an All-Star-caliber talent like Bichette, the Tigers could demonstrate to Skubal - and the rest of the roster - that the organization is intent on competing for a World Series.Also read: MLB trade rumors: Philadelphia Phillies potentially eyeing $190 million star amid Alec Bohm uncertainty The Detroit Tigers‚Äô front office faces a defining offseason. Whether they re-sign Torres or make an aggressive move for Bichette, their decisions will shape the team‚Äôs trajectory for years to come.
Article Summary: The detroit tigers face a crucial decision regarding gleyber torres, who is now an unrestricted free agent. Torres played in 145 regular-season games in 2025, producing a.256/.358/.387 slash line. The tigers could make a blockbuster move by trading with the toronto blue jays for two-time all-star bo bichette.

Article Title: What happened to Zion Williamson? Pelicans star forward receives heartbreaking injury update
Article Text:
Zion Williamson. Image via: Chris Graythen/ Getty Images

Zion Williamson‚Äôs latest hamstring injury halts strong start



The New Orleans Pelicans‚Äô winless start to the 2025 NBA season just took another painful turn. Star forward Zion Williamson has suffered a Grade 1 left hamstring strain, the team announced Tuesday, sidelining him for at least seven to ten days. The 25-year-old will be re-evaluated after that period, but no official return date has been set.The timing couldn‚Äôt be worse for New Orleans, which sits at 0-6 after a rough opening stretch. Williamson had been one of the few bright spots, leading the team in scoring, rebounding, and assists. His latest setback adds another chapter to a career that‚Äôs been defined as much by injuries as by his explosive talent.Before his injury, Zion Williamson was averaging 22.8 points, 6.8 rebounds, and 4.6 assists per game, proving once again why he‚Äôs the centerpiece of the Pelicans‚Äô offense. In Sunday‚Äôs loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder, he led the team with 20 points, nine rebounds, and six assists, displaying the versatility that made him the No. 1 overall pick in the 2019 NBA Draft.But just days later, the Pelicans confirmed the news fans dreaded. ‚ÄúZion Williamson has been diagnosed with a grade 1 left hamstring strain. He will be re-evaluated in 7-10 days and further updates will be appropriately provided.,‚Äùthe team‚Äôs statement read. The announcement sparked concern, given Williamson‚Äôs long history of lower-body injuries, particularly hamstring issues that have sidelined him repeatedly in recent seasons.Since entering the league, Williamson has played in just 219 of a possible 478 regular-season games, missing more time than he‚Äôs been available. He appeared in only 30 contests last season before a back injury ended his campaign early. Despite these interruptions, his efficiency remains elite, averaging 24.6 points on 58.6% shooting for his career.The setback is particularly disheartening considering Williamson‚Äôs efforts to start the season healthy. He told reporters during training camp, ‚ÄúIt feels good to feel good. I haven‚Äôt felt like this since college or high school.‚Äù His improved conditioning and dominant preseason performances had reignited hope that he might finally play a full season.Now, that hope is once again on pause. The Pelicans, desperate to turn their season around, must regroup without their franchise cornerstone.Also Read: Kawhi Leonard‚Äôs name dragged once again as 11 Aspiration investors filed lawsuit against LA Clippers owner Steve Ballmer
Article Summary: Zion williamson has been ruled out for at least seven to ten days with a hamstring strain. The new orleans pelicans star had been leading the team in scoring, rebounding, and assists. The 25-year-old will be re-evaluated after that period, but no return date has been set.

Article Title: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs the New Orleans Pelicans? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (November 4, 2025)
Article Text:
LaMelo Ball. Image via: David Liam Kyle / NBAE via Getty Images

Charlotte Hornets

LaMelo Ball‚Äôs availability remains uncertain

Latest Injury Update: Charlotte Hornets Monitoring LaMelo Ball Closely

LaMelo Ball‚Äôs Season Performance So Far

What It Means for Charlotte Hornets Fans

Themay have to make a crucial decision tonight asahead of their matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans. The 23-year-old guard has been dealing with a right ankle impingement that kept him out of Sunday‚Äôs game against the Utah Jazz. His recovery progress is being closely watched, and his presence - or absence - could play a major role in shaping the Hornets‚Äô chances on the road.Ball‚Äôs injury has drawn significant attention given his importance to Charlotte‚Äôs offense. As one of the league‚Äôs premier playmakers, his ability to control tempo, create scoring opportunities, and rebound effectively makes him indispensable to the team‚Äôs success. The Hornets‚Äô medical staff has listed him as questionable on the latest injury report released on November 4, 2025, indicating that his final game-time status will likely depend on how his ankle responds during pre-game warmups.The Charlotte Hornets confirmed that LaMelo Ball missed Sunday‚Äôs contest versus the Jazz due to his ongoing ankle issue, and while his condition has improved slightly, there‚Äôs still caution surrounding his return.He is listed as "questionable" for tonight's game vs the New Orleans Pelicans. The team‚Äôs official report categorized his status as questionable, suggesting that they‚Äôre weighing the risk of aggravating the injury against the need for his leadership on the court. Charlotte‚Äôs coaching staff has emphasized that Ball will undergo further evaluation before tip-off in New Orleans.The right ankle impingement has limited Ball‚Äôs ability to pivot and drive effectively - both critical parts of his dynamic playstyle. Although the Charlotte Hornets have managed without him in short stretches, his absence has been felt, especially in transition plays and late-game execution. Given how early it is in the season, the team is expected to prioritize long-term health over short-term gains, but a surprise return tonight remains a possibility if Ball clears medical checks.Before this setback, Ball had been delivering another impressive season, averaging 23.3 points, 9.8 assists, and 7.8 rebounds per game across six appearances. Those numbers highlight his all-around impact, not only as a scorer but also as a facilitator and rebounder. His chemistry with young teammates like Brandon Miller and Mark Williams has been a bright spot for the Charlotte Hornets‚Äô developing offense.If he takes the court tonight, Ball could immediately tilt the momentum in Charlotte‚Äôs favor. His court vision and rebounding ability have been key to keeping the Hornets competitive, and his playmaking presence helps stretch defenses, giving shooters more open looks.Also read: Is Joel Embiid playing tonight vs the Chicago Bulls? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (November 4, 2025) With the Charlotte Hornets sitting at 3‚Äì4 and aiming to even their record, Ball‚Äôs availability could be the deciding factor in their performance against a Pelicans squad still searching for its first win of the season. Fans and bettors alike will be watching closely for the team‚Äôs final update before tip-off. While uncertainty lingers, optimism remains that LaMelo Ball may suit up tonight and continue his strong start to the 2025-26 campaign.
Article Summary: Lamelo ball is listed as "questionable" for tonight's game vs the new orleans pelicans. The 23-year-old guard has been dealing with a right ankle impingement that kept him out of sunday‚Äôs game against the utah jazz. His recovery progress is being closely watched, and his presence - or absence - could play a major role in shaping the hornets' chances on the road.

Article Title: Meghan Markle‚Äôs friend reveals the real reason Prince Harry looked upset after Dodgers‚Äô World Series win
Article Text:
Meghan Markle‚Äôs friend reveals the real reason Prince Harry looked upset after Dodgers‚Äô World Series win (Image via Getty)

Fans Call Out Meghan Over Viral World Series Clip With Disinterested Prince Harry | WATCH

Meghan Markle‚Äôs joyful Dodgers celebration shows her team spirit

Prince Harry‚Äôs calm reaction to the Dodgers‚Äô World Series win surprises fans





On November 1, the Dodgers beat the Toronto Blue Jays 5-4 in Game 7 after 11 innings. Meghan Markle‚Äôs close friend Kelly McKee Zajfen shared the couple‚Äôs reaction on her Instagram Stories, joking, ‚ÄúBest game ever! Sorry H, your team didn‚Äôt win but mine diiiiiiid. @Dodgers I LOVE YOU!!!!‚ÄùMeghan, 44, was seen laughing and dancing with Kelly as they celebrated the Dodgers‚Äô win at home. Prince Harry, 41, sat quietly in a recliner, looking less excited. In the short clip shared online, Meghan Markle sealed her celebration with a kiss, while Prince Harry‚Äôs puzzled look quickly caught fans‚Äô attention.Kelly McKee Zajfen‚Äôs video showed a big difference between Meghan‚Äôs energy and Harry‚Äôs mood. Meghan cheered for the Dodgers, shouting and laughing, while Harry seemed to be quietly supporting the Blue Jays instead. Kelly later teased Harry for his reaction, calling it ‚Äúthe best game ever.‚ÄùJust a few days earlier, the royal couple had attended Game 4 of the World Series in Los Angeles on October 28. Both wore matching Dodgers baseball caps and smiled for the crowd. Fans now say Prince Harry‚Äôs reaction at home showed where his true loyalties might lie.Prince Harry and Meghan Marklemoved to California in 2020 after stepping down as senior royals. Since then, they‚Äôve often been spotted at local sports events and family outings.Meghan Markle recently called Prince Harry ‚Äúmy biggest supporter‚Äù during an April interview on Jamie Kern Lima‚Äôs podcast. ‚ÄúHe loves me so much,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve built a beautiful life and have two healthy, happy kids.‚ÄùAlso Read: Victor Conte, Man Behind MLB‚Äôs Biggest Steroid Scandal, Dies At 75 The couple share a six-year-old son, Prince Archie, and a four-year-old daughter, Princess Lilibet. Meghan said they still feel like they‚Äôre in a ‚Äúhoneymoon period‚Äù even after seven years of marriage. She also spoke about her new Netflix series With Love, Meghan and her return to Instagram to share her family life.While Meghan Markle‚Äôs cheering moment has gone viral, fans can‚Äôt stop talking about Prince Harry‚Äôs calm face during the Dodgers‚Äô big win, a look that said everything without a word.
Article Summary: Meghan markle‚Äôs friend reveals the real reason prince harry looked upset after dodgers‚Äô world series win. Meghan cheered for the dodgers, shouting and laughing, while harry seemed to be quietly supporting the blue jays instead. Kelly mckee zajfen later teased harry for his reaction, calling it ‚Äúthe best game ever‚Äù

Article Title: Julio Rodr√≠guez's girlfriend Jordyn Huitema's heartfelt reaction to Jeremy Pe√±a's partner Julia Grosso's game-changing Chicago Stars deal wins hearts online
Article Text:
Julio Rodr√≠guez with his partner Jordyn Huitema (Image via: Getty Image)

From gold medals to rival clubs, Jordyn Huitema‚Äôs heartfelt reaction shows the bond that still shines through

Chicago doubles down on its future by locking in Grosso‚Äôs leadership until 2028

It‚Äôs a big win for Chicago ‚Äî and an even bigger one for Canadian soccer star Julia Grosso. On Tuesday, the midfielder, who is also the girlfriend of Houston Astros shortstop Jeremy Pe√±a, signed a long-term extension with Chicago Stars FC that will keep her with the club through the 2028 NWSL season. The team confirmed the news on Instagram, posting, ‚Äú‚ú∂ From Canada, for Chicago ‚ú∂ Julia Grosso re-signs with Chicago Stars FC through 2028! " Within hours, the announcement sparked a wave of reactions from across the sports world, including a warm and emotional response from Grosso‚Äôs Olympic teammate Jordyn Huitema ‚Äî who happens to be dating Seattle Mariners outfielder Julio Rodr√≠guez.Huitema quickly reshared the club‚Äôs post on her Instagram story, adding a heartfelt caption that fans couldn‚Äôt stop talking about. ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs there to stay,‚Äù she wrote, followed by another line that said, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve got a good one, Chicago,‚Äù tagging Grosso. The moment went viral within minutes, with fans praising the genuine friendship and sportsmanship between the two athletes, both of whom have balanced elite football careers with life alongside MLB superstars.Huitema‚Äôs reaction wasn‚Äôt just about club loyalty ‚Äî it came from a place of shared triumph and years of mutual respect.The two have been inseparable teammates for years, first linking up as part of the Canadian women‚Äôs national team that captured the country‚Äôs first-ever gold medal at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics. It was Grosso who etched her name into Canadian sports history that day, calmly converting the decisive penalty in the final against Sweden after a tense 1-1 draw through extra time.Huitema, a rising star then, played a crucial role in that same campaign, and their shared Olympic journey cemented a friendship that has lasted well beyond national duties. Today, even as they represent rival NWSL clubs ‚Äî Huitema with Seattle Reign and Grosso with Chicago Stars ‚Äî their support for one another remains strong and sincere, as reflected in Huitema‚Äôs viral post.For Chicago Stars FC, re-signing Grosso represents more than a simple extension ‚Äî it‚Äôs a statement of intent. Since joining the club (then called the Chicago Red Stars) in 2024 after a successful stint with Juventus, Grosso has become the heartbeat of their midfield. Her composure under pressure, technical precision, and leadership have made her one of the most dependable players in the NWSL.Extending her contract through 2028 signals Chicago‚Äôs confidence in her as a foundational piece of their rebuild and future success. It also solidifies Grosso‚Äôs role as one of the league‚Äôs top international stars, bringing both experience and visibility to the franchise.Huitema‚Äôs message ‚Äî ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs there to stay‚Äù ‚Äî summed up the sentiment perfectly. And as fans continue to celebrate the moment, it‚Äôs clear that this was more than a signing; it was a celebration of friendship, legacy, and belief that greatness lasts when built together.Also read: "No fairytale ending": George Springer‚Äôs wife Charlise breaks silence after Toronto Blue Jays‚Äô devastating World Series loss
Article Summary: Julia grosso signed a long-term contract extension with chicago stars fc on tuesday. Her olympic teammate jordyn huitema shared the news on her instagram story. The post went viral, with fans praising the genuine friendship between the two athletes.

Article Title: Connor McDavid makes history with 1,100th point against Blues, joins NHL legends Wayne Gretzky, Mario Lemieux, and Mike Bossy among all-time greats
Article Text: Connor McDavid reached a historic milestone, recording his 1,100th career point in the Edmonton Oilers‚Äô win over the St. Louis Blues. The achievement places him among NHL legends Wayne Gretzky, Mario Lemieux, and Mike Bossy as one of the fastest players to reach the mark, further solidifying McDavid‚Äôs status as one of hockey‚Äôs all-time greats.
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid recorded his 1,100th career point in the edmonton oilers‚Äô win over the st. louis blues. The achievement places him among nhl legends wayne gretzky, mario lemieux, and mike bossy as one of the fastest players to reach the mark.

Article Title: Did Blake Treinen really wear a Charlie Kirk hat during the World Series? The truth behind the viral photo
Article Text:
Did Blake Treinen really wear a Charlie Kirk hat during the World Series? The truth behind the viral photo (Image via X)

Blake Treinen‚Äôs tribute hat photo sparks Charlie Kirk confusion after Dodgers‚Äô World Series win

Social media users wrongly claim Blake Treinen wore the Charlie Kirk hat in the World Series

A new rumor about Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Blake Treinen spread online after the team‚Äôs World Series win on Saturday, November 1, 2025. The claim said Treinen wore a hat with ‚ÄúCharlie Kirk‚Äù written on it during the World Series celebration. But this claim is false. The viral picture that started it all was not from the World Series.It was from a September 12 game against the San Francisco Giants, weeks before the championship series. The image began circulating after a Facebook post by user Scott Mandel falsely said Treinen wore the hat ‚Äúduring the World Series.‚Äù Several pages, including The Dodgers TOP, then reposted the same image, spreading the wrong information further.The photo is real, but it‚Äôs old. During the September 12, 2025 game in San Francisco, Blake Treinen wore a special white hat with ‚ÄúCharlie Kirk‚Äù written on it and two small Christian crosses. This was to honor Charlie Kirk, the founder of Turning Point USA (TPUSA), who was shot and killed on September 10 during an event at Utah Valley University.According to Fox News, Blake Treinen, who is known for his strong Christian faith, wore the tribute hat as a personal gesture. Musician Sean Feucht shared photos and a short video from that game on Instagram, writing:‚ÄúMy friend and pitcher for the Dodgers, Blake Treinen, played with this on his hat last night.‚ÄùFeucht later posted another video from October 8, showing Treinen giving the hat away after a game against the Philadelphia Phillies, and thanked him for ‚Äúremembering Charlie Kirk tonight.‚ÄùAfter the Dodgers‚Äô World Series win, the same September photo began to recirculate on Facebook and X. Some users wrongly claimed the hat appeared during the World Series celebration.Also Read: Barack Obama Sends Heartfelt Reaction To Los Angeles Dodgers‚Äô World Series Triumph After Nerve-Racking Game 7 Over Toronto Blue Jays Fact-checking sites including Primetimer and Fox News confirmed that the image was not taken during the World Series. There are no verified photos or videos showing Blake Treinen wearing the Charlie Kirk tribute hat at the title celebration or any 2025 postseason game.
Article Summary: A new rumor about los angeles dodgers pitcher blake treinen spread online after the team‚Äôs world series win on november 1, 2025. The claim said treinen wore a hat with ‚Äúcharlie kirk‚Äù written on it during the world series celebration. But this claim is false. The viral picture that started it all was not from the world series.

Article Text:
Toronto Raptors vs Milwaukee Bucks. Image via: Jonathan Daniel - Getty Images

Toronto Raptors vs Milwaukee Bucks - Game Prediction

Another day, and yet another exciting matchup between two of the most prominent NBA teams, and fans are really excited about this upcoming matchup. So fasten your seatbelts and secure a seat at the court as the Toronto Raptors are going to clash with the Milwaukee Bucks for the second time in the 2025-26 NBA season. The Raptors have already lost 122-116 to the Milwaukee Bucks. This time, being a second chance, the Raptors will have to prove to their fans that they are no less, and will have to secure their names on the walls of victory.The pressure on the players is real as they have hundreds of eyes on them, and fans want their favorite team to win. This season, the Bucks have won five games while the Raptors have won only three. From the expected lineup to the injury report, here is everything you need to know about Tuesday‚Äôs clash between the Toronto Raptors and the Milwaukee Bucks.The Milwaukee Bucks will face the Toronto Raptors in an exciting NBA game, starting at 7:30 pm ET. The Raptors will host the Bucks at Scotiabank Arena in Toronto, Ontario, on Tuesday, November 4, 2025. The game will be streamed live on NBC and Peacock.The Toronto Raptors have only won three matches against the Grizzlies, Cavaliers, and Hawks. They already lost once to the Milwaukee Bucks earlier in this season, and so they have to play it safe in order to revamp and resurrect their forgone names.With players like RJ Barrett and Collin Murray-Boyles, they will have to anticipate the moves of their opponents and then reformulate their strategies accordingly. Without their key player, Jakob Poeltl, who is out due to injury, it will be a hard time for them.However, the Milwaukee Bucks have already won five matches, including the one against the Toronto Raptors. With players like Giannis Antetokounmpo, Ryan Rollins, AJ Green, and Myles Turner, they remain unstoppable as ever. However, the injury of Kevin Porter Jr. might cost them a little, but they will have to fill the void here and revamp their strategies accordingly.Also read: NBA legend Michael Redd hints at ‚Äòbigger play‚Äô behind Stephen Curry‚Äôs appearance on LeBron James‚Äô podcast
Article Summary: The milwaukee bucks will face the toronto raptors in an exciting nba game, starting at 7:30 pm et. The raptors will host the bucks at scotiabank arena in toronto, ontario, on tuesday, november 4, 2025. The game will be streamed live on nbc and peacock.

Article Title: NaLyssa Smith drops subtle hint in her latest IG post as breakup rumors with DiJonai Carrington shock the internet
Article Text:
NaLyssa Smith and DiJonai Carrington (via Getty Images)

DiJonai Carrington‚Äôs post fuels breakup speculation with NaLyssa Smith



Las Vegas Aces star NaLyssa Smith has finally spoken up on social media after two weeks of silence. Her new Instagram post comes amid growing rumors about her breakup with the Minnesota Lynx star DiJonai Carrington. Carrington had earlier shared a series of photos and cryptic messages that made fans believe something was wrong between the two WNBA players.In her latest post, Smith shared several pictures showing off her new, slimmed-down look. She wore a white long-sleeved shirt, camouflage shorts, sneakers, a Chrome Hearts cap, and a No. 3 chain. While some fans praised her for her insane weight loss transformation, a few commented, hoping their favorite WNBA couple has not yet separated. Fans also noticed a new tattoo on the right side of her neck that read, ‚ÄúThank you God. ‚Äù It was the same phrase she posted after the Aces won the 2025 WNBA championship against the Phoenix Mercury.NaLyssa Smith‚Äôs social media post has arrived just a few days after DiJonai Carrington‚Äôs emotional Instagram story, which sparked rumors about their split. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve always been afraid of losing people I love. Sometimes I wonder, is there anyone out there afraid to lose me,‚Äù Carrington‚Äôs post read.Both Smith and Carrington have now unfollowed each other on Instagram, further fueling the breakup talk. Several fans have also noticed that both have removed pictures of each other from their accounts. Despite that, Smith still follows Carrington‚Äôs mother, Vickie, and brother, Darren Carrington II.The couple started dating back in 2020 while playing at Baylor University. The couple briefly broke up last year but later reconciled. At one point, there were even rumors of an engagement after Carrington appeared with a ring in a pregame photo.This season, both players began the season with the Dallas Wings before they traded Smith to the Las Vegas Aces and Carrington to the Minnesota Lynx. While NaLyssa Smith went on to help the Las Vegas Aces win another WNBA championship, DiJonai Carrington continued her strong season with the Minnesota Lynx.Notably, the fans have always loved their relationship, calling them one of the WNBA‚Äôs most popular couples. However, as of now, neither Smith nor Carrington has confirmed or denied the breakup rumors.Also Read: 5 heartwarming WNBA love stories that will make you go weak in your knees
Article Summary: Las vegas aces star nalyssa smith has finally spoken up on social media after two weeks of silence. Her new instagram post comes amid growing rumors about her breakup with the minnesota lynx star dijonai carrington. Carrington had earlier shared a series of photos and cryptic messages that made fans believe something was wrong between the two wnba players.

Article Title: Former Bruins forward Milan Lucic lands another PTO, eyes contract with Blues' AHL affiliate
Article Text:
Former Boston Bruins forward Milan Lucic has secured a new professional try-out (PTO) contract with AHL (Credit: AP Photo/Charles Krupa, File)

Milan Lucic lands another PTO with St. Louis Blues affiliate Springfield Thunderbirds

Also read:

Former Boston Bruins forward Milan Lucic has secured a new professional try-out (PTO) contract with AHL‚Äôs Springfield Thunderbirds, the St. Louis Blues announced on Tuesday. According to reports, Lucic is already on PTO with the Blues during training camp, but his chances were derailed when the 6-foot-3 left winger suffered a lower-body injury during preseason play.However, after landing this new PTO with the Blues' AHL affiliate, he is now getting another chance to try to earn a contract for the season. The signing, officially announced by the Blues, marks a fresh attempt for the 37-year-old winger to earn a spot in a full-season contract. With the new PTO in Springfield, Lucic now has a clear opportunity to show his strength and prowess on ice, with the hope of becoming an impactful player of the team. Milan Lucic has landed another PTO on Tuesday with the AHL‚Äôs Springfield Thunderbirds. According to the NHL, St. Louis Blues President of Hockey Operations and General Manager Doug Armstrong announced today that forward Milan Lucic will join the Blues‚Äô AHL affiliate, the Springfield Thunderbirds.Earlier, he joined the St. Louis Blues on a PTO ahead of the 2025 training camp, but his chances were derailed when the former Boston Bruins veteran suffered a lower-body injury.With the new PTO in Springfield, Lucic now has a clear opportunity to show his effectiveness on ice.It is to be noted that Lucic last played in the NHL during the 2023-24 season with the Bruins. In four games for the Bruins that campaign, the left winger recorded two assists, 12 hits, and a minus-1 rating. However, his stint with the Bruins was cut short, as he entered the NHL Player Assistance Program after being arrested for an alleged domestic incident. Though the legal charges were dropped, the incident created a hindrance in his game.Despite this, Milan Lilac managed to play with the Bruins, where he appeared in 570 games and accumulated 139 goals, 205 assists, 344 points, 774 penalty minutes, and 1,592 hits. Besides, he also captured a Stanley Cup title with Boston Bruins in 2011, proving his position as a top-tier power forward of his generation.
Article Summary: Former boston bruins forward milan lucic has secured a new professional try-out (pto) contract with ahl‚Äôs springfield thunderbirds. The signing, officially announced by the blues, marks a fresh attempt for the 37-year-old winger to earn a spot in a full-season contract. Lucic last played in the nhl during the 2023-24 season with the bruins.

Article Title: "We got a Mind the Game exclusive" - LeBron James and Stephen Curry learn what finally pushed Steve Nash toward retirement
Article Text:
Mind the Game (Image via X)

How Stephen Curry became the final trigger that led to Steve Nash retire

Stephen Curry joined LeBron James and Steve Nash for the latest episode of their Mind the Game podcast, and it was an absolute hoot. From exchanging hilarious stories to showcasing the respect and admiration they have for each other, the episode gave fans a lot to cover. But one of the best bits came when Steve Nash revealed the reason behind his retirement from the game of basketball.Nash started his playing career with the Phoenix Suns back in 1996 - a team he played for the majority of his career. Then after 15 years, he left the playing cleats behind in 2015 after his last tenure - 4 years with the Los Angeles Lakers. Many believed it was due to his health issues, but as recently revealed by Nash himself - while they definitely did play a part, one major reason for his retirement was none other than Stephen Curry.Stephen Curry was 21 years old when he joined the NBA as a player for the Golden State Warriors back in 2009. But it wasn't until 2013-2014 that he finally came into his being, showcasing his talent on the court as one of the top players to ever grace the league. And it was in 2015, when Steve Nash retired after playing in the league for 15 years. He was already having some back and knee problems before his last season started, and during the Mind the Game episode, he reminisced about a preseason game when he and his LA Lakers team faced the Warriors with Curry running the game."I'm guarding Steph... he's running everywhere, I'm like back is broke... I think it's time. If you can't beat 'em..."Nash spoke of how Curry's game style and the way he had the point guard running all over the court, and feeling like he was going to break his back, made him finally think that maybe it was time to consider the possibility of retirement. Bron could be heard cackling while Nash was making the admission, saying, "I don't like to talk about this in public," to which the Lakers star said, "We got a Mind the Game exclusive," in response.LeBron James had once said, during one such episode of Mind the Game, that Steph Curry was a player whose influence on the game has been one of the biggest on the game. He named Curry and Allen Iverson as two players who had the biggest impact on the game ever, since he started watching the game, which is high praise for the Warriors star. But who knew he was also the reason behind his friend and teammate retiring from the game as a player.Also Read: ‚ÄúI'm pulled in a lot of areas": Stephen Curry‚Äôs heartfelt confession about striving to be a "better husband" resurfaces as Ayesha Curry faces heat
Article Summary: Stephen curry joined lebron james and steve nash for the latest episode of their mind the game podcast. Nash revealed the reason behind his retirement from the game of basketball. He spoke of how curry's game style and the way he had the point guard running all over the court, and feeling like he was going to break his back, made him finally think it was time to consider retirement.

Article Title: Shock Ashes call-up! Uncapped Jake Weatherald named in Australia‚Äôs squad as Steve Smith takes charge
Article Text:
Australian cricket team (Photo by Mark Evans/Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Australia has named uncapped opener Jake Weatherald in their 15-man squad for the first Ashes Test against England, along with Brendan Doggett and Sean Abbott as backup fast bowlers. The squad announcement came on Wednesday in Sydney, with Steve Smith set to captain in place of injured Pat Cummins for the series opener in Perth on November 21.The 31-year-old Weatherald could become Usman Khawaja's sixth opening partner since David Warner's retirement last year, following unsuccessful trials with Steve Smith, Nathan McSweeney, Sam Konstas, Travis Head, and Marnus Labuschagne.Chief selector George Bailey has not confirmed Weatherald's place in the starting eleven. "No, not confirmed in the XI. Obviously we've got 14 of our 15-man squad playing round four (of the Sheffield Shield). Still some information to gather out of that. Cameron Green, being one, returning to the bowling crease, that'd be good," Bailey said.Cameron Green's bowling fitness remains a key consideration, having only bowled minimal overs since returning from back surgery 13 months ago.If Green can bowl sufficient overs, he will likely bat at number six, with Weatherald opening and Labuschagne at number three.The team might alternatively position Labuschagne to open with Khawaja, moving Green to number three and Beau Webster to sixth position if Green's bowling remains limited."We are looking forward to the squad connecting and preparing in Perth leading on from a busy domestic and white ball schedule to kick off the Test summer," Bailey added.Regular captain Pat Cummins, who has been sidelined with a lower back injury since facing the West Indies, will travel with the squad to Perth and aims to return for the day-night second Test in Brisbane from December 4.Scott Boland will lead the pace attack alongside Mitchell Starc and Josh Hazlewood in Cummins' absence.Spinner Nathan Lyon enters his 140th Test needing just two wickets to surpass Glenn McGrath and become the sixth-highest wicket-taker in Test history.The five-Test series will proceed from Perth to Brisbane, Adelaide, Melbourne, and Sydney.England, who managed a 2-2 draw in the 2023 home Ashes series, haven't won in Australia since 2010-2011.The Australian squad consists of Steve Smith (captain), Sean Abbott, Scott Boland, Alex Carey, Brendan Doggett, Cameron Green, Josh Hazlewood, Travis Head, Josh Inglis, Usman Khawaja, Marnus Labuschagne, Nathan Lyon, Mitchell Starc, Jake Weatherald, and Beau Webster.
Article Summary: Jake weatherald named in australia's 15-man squad for first ashes test. Brendan doggett and sean abbott named as backup fast bowlers. Steve smith set to captain in place of injured pat cummins. First test starts in perth on november 21.

Article Title: 'Not on the same level with 1983': Sunil Gavaskar‚Äôs bold take on India women‚Äôs World Cup win
Article Text:
Harmanpreet Kaur of India lifts the ICC Women's Cricket World Cup trophy (Photo by Pankaj Nangia/Getty Images)

India women's cricket team leave hotel, likely to meet PM Narendra Modi next

The Indian women‚Äôs cricket team finally had their fairytale moment when they beat South Africa by 52 runs in the final to lift the Women‚Äôs World Cup for the first time. After falling short twice in 2005 and 2017, Harmanpreet Kaur and her team rewrote history, ending years of heartbreak and bringing home the biggest prize in the game.The win sparked memories of India‚Äôs famous 1983 men‚Äôs World Cup victory under Kapil Dev, when a young team stunned the mighty West Indies. Many drew parallels between the two triumphs, but legendary opener Sunil Gavaskar believes the achievements, though both iconic, should not be seen on the same scale.Writing in his column for The Sportstar, Gavaskar said, ‚ÄúThe win once again emphasised, if ever it was needed, that sporting intelligence wins trophies, not fancy degrees from universities. It also proves that it will invariably be Indian coaches who get the best results since they know the players ‚Äì their strengths, weaknesses, and temperament ‚Äì and understand the nuances of Indian cricket better than any foreigner, however accomplished he or she may be. ‚ÄùGavaskar went on to explain why he does not see the 2025 victory as identical to the men‚Äôs triumph in 1983. ‚ÄúThere were some who tried to compare this win with the men‚Äôs team winning the World Cup in 1983.The men had never progressed beyond the group stage in earlier editions, and so everything from the knockout stage onward was new to them, while the women already had a better record, having been in two finals before this magnificent triumph. ‚ÄùHis point carried weight. While the 1983 team was a complete underdog, the Indian women had already shown their potential in global tournaments, reaching the ODI finals in 2005 and 2017 and the T20 World Cup final in 2020. Yet, Gavaskar acknowledged that Harmanpreet‚Äôs team had achieved something monumental.‚ÄúJust as the '83 win galvanised Indian cricket and gave it a voice that was heard around the world, this victory will make the countries that started women‚Äôs cricket long before India did realise that their era of domination has been shaken. The ‚Äô83 win also encouraged parents of aspiring cricketers to let their children take up the game,‚Äù he added.Gavaskar further highlighted how this victory could change the landscape for women‚Äôs cricket in India. ‚ÄúSimilarly, this win will give new wings to women‚Äôs cricket, bringing more girls into the game from the remotest parts of India. The WPL has already begun that process, as parents now see the sport as a genuine career option for their daughters and are more willing to support them.‚ÄùWhile the men‚Äôs 1983 win created a cricketing revolution, Gavaskar believes Harmanpreet Kaur‚Äôs World Cup-winning side has lit a similar spark for women‚Äôs cricket in India, one that could inspire the next generation of young girls to pick up the bat and ball.
Article Summary: India women's cricket team won the women's world cup for the first time. Harmanpreet kaur's side beat south africa by 52 runs in the final. The win sparked memories of india's 1983 men‚Äôs world cup victory. Many drew parallels between the two triumphs, but sunil gavaskar believes they should not be seen on the same scale.

Article Title: Hardik Pandya drops new post featuring Mahieka Sharma; photos and playful car-wash video go viral
Article Text: Hardik Pandya appears to be embracing a happier chapter, recently sharing candid moments with model Mahieka Sharma, including a playful car wash. These public displays suggest a blossoming relationship, a stark contrast to his previously private life. Fans are noting a newfound sense of peace in the cricketer, who is also seen enjoying time with his son Agastya.
